page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT IN DEWSBURY
page.content: A study of employment was completed based on data retrieved from a sample of some 280 adults within the area. Within the sample the figure for those without full time employment(male and female between the ages of 16-65) averaged 32% athough this varied greatly from 17% in some areas to up to almost 60% in others. Of those employed full time(about 40 hours a week) over 80% had jobs locally and a further 10% within 15 miles of the area.16% of the adults in the study were employed on a part time (less than 30 hours per week)basis. 5% of those in full time employment held professional positions while the other main areas of employment included textiles 24%, retail 16%, engineering (including motor trade) 13%, building and related industries 12%, public services 10%.
